qas.question: What PS3 game can integrate a PlayStation Portable to use as a rear-view mirror?
What kind of game is Formula One Championship Edition?
If users want to download original PlayStation games, where do they go online?
Games in plain PlayStation format can be played both on the PS3 console and what other device?
What's the name of the feature that would let you play a game on your PSP without having it with you?
What PS2 game can integrate a PlayStation Portable to use as a rear-view mirror?
What kind of game is Formula Two Championship Edition?
If users want to download original PlayStation games, where do they go offline?
Games in plain PlayStation format can be played both on the PS4 console and what other device?
What's the name of the feature that would let you play a game on your PSP while having it with you?

context: PlayStation Portable can connect with PlayStation 3 in many ways, including in-game connectivity. For example, <a0_0><b5_0>Formula One Championship Edition<b5_0/><a0_0/>, a <a1_0><b6_0>racing<b6_0/><a1_0/> game, was shown at E3 2006 using a PSP as a real-time rear-view mirror. In addition, users are able to download original PlayStation format games from the <a2_0><b7_0>PlayStation Store<b7_0/><a2_0/>, transfer and play them on <a3_0><b8_0>PSP<b8_0/><a3_0/> as well as PS3 itself. It is also possible to use the <a4_0><b9_0>Remote Play<b9_0/><a4_0/> feature to play these and some PlayStation Network games, remotely on PSP over a network or internet connection.
